author: craigmcc
msg: Iniital checkin of substantially revised support for the "dialog" concept.
WARNING:  The example apps and unit tests to validate this code are still
being developed, so there are undoubtedly going to be bugs in the
implementation that need to be swatted.
This approach implements a custom JSF NavigationHandler implementation, and
supports the ability to nest dialogs, and reuse individual views in a dialog,
without messing up the standard navigation support provided by JSF.  Any
existing code that relies on DialogController should be targeted for migration
to this new facility -- DialogController will be removed as soon as the
behavior of this code has been vetted.
NOTE - As the package documentation for "org.apache.shale.dialog" indicates,
this implementation was *heavily* inspired by the way that Spring WebFlow
does things.  It should be considered as an implementation that covers the
simplest cases Spring WebFlow was designed to cover -- a fuller integration
with SWF will also be provided to cover the cases where you need the more
sophisticated functionality that SWF provides.
